HelpXML.Title: FSMenvmmd
HelpXML.Purpose: FSMenvmmd computes the theoretical envelopes of Minimum MD outside subset during the search

Item.Name: init
Item.ShortDesc: Point where to start monitoring required diagnostics.
Item.LongDesc: Note that if bsb is supplied, init>=length(bsb). If init is not specified it will be set equal to floor(n*0.6).

Item.Name: prob
Item.ShortDesc: quantiles for which envelopes have to be computed.
Item.LongDesc: Vector containing 1 x k elements . The default is to produce 1 per cent, 50 per cent and 99 per cent envelopes.

Item.Name: exact
Item.ShortDesc: It indicates how to calculate the quantiles of F distribution.
Item.LongDesc: If it is equal to 1 (default) is based on function finv and from the Matlab statistics toolbox, otherwise the calculations of the former quantiles is based on functions invcdff. The solution has a tolerance of 1e-8 (change variable tol in files invcdff.m) Remark. the use of function finv is more precise but requires more time.

Item.Name: scaled
Item.ShortDesc: It indicates how to compute the envelopes.
Item.LongDesc: If scaled=1 the envelopes are produced for scaled Mahalanobis distances (no consistency factor is applied) else the traditional consistency factor is applied (this is the default)
Item.DataType:
double
Subfunctions. invcdff.
Other function dependencies: none.
